title: src/librustc/hir/def.rs:271: attempted .def_id() on invalid def: Err

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-stable
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from one stable version to another.

body:
Rust version affected
---------------------

Both stable and nightly:

```
rustc 1.35.0 (3c235d560 2019-05-20)
rustc 1.37.0-nightly (02564de47 2019-06-10)
```

How to reproduce
-----------------

Run `cargo doc` on this code:

```
git@github.com:little-dude/xrl.git
cd xrl
git checkout unbox
cargo doc  # note that `cargo build`, `cargo test`, `cargo check` and `cargo clippy` work fine
```

Stacktrace
----------

```
error: internal compiler error: src/librustc/hir/def.rs:271: attempted .def_id() on invalid def: Err

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<Any>', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:635:9
```
